channel.title: Arctic-Pk || Recruiting Developers || 317 || Apply ||
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/207485g.png[/img]
Hmmm. My introduction, I am the owner of The New Arctic-Pk, and I am happy to say that we are looking for a staff and development team. I am looking to bring new people and new ideas in to this small project I have been working on. At this moment we have made it to 11 rank on rune-server toplist and obtaining higher ranks on others. We have a dedicated player base, and we have plenty of room for growth but we need a developer/developers to help out. Apply now or forever wonder what could I have been apart of!
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/29pq7b9.png[/img]
So basically, I once was a rsps addict, after runescape fell apart. Then someone gave me the idea a few years back to start my own but I always disregarded it. Thus Arctic-Pk was born. My whole reason for making this server is because all the people I knew were unsatisfied with the servers they were playing and wishing for a better one. Well the plan grew more and more then it became a reality. All of my mates joined their mates joined then it was running, smooth. Unfortunately alot of things happend to me irl so arctic-pk had to hibernate, now shes up and hungrier than ever.
My goal is to just make a fun place to Pk and have fun with mates, and a place were people can play all day, no down time, no interruptions.
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/kejcz7.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/33zefes.png[/img]
All of the developers, after trust is earned will use my team viewer or my drop box and eventually they will get the files so they can code on their own. Most of our donations will go to our servers vps and all upcoming new things, vbulliten ect. But our developers do in fact get paid if they so request it.
We need many small things, and yes big updates eventually but as of right now our features include: - Working Curses 100% - All specials 100% - Non-freezing barrage orbs 100% - All skills, dung and summoning 100% - Working dice bag for donors 100% - All bosses with rare drops 100% - And many more coming soon with new development help - Working Nex armours 100% - Pvp Armors 100% - Growing community / Active Staff - Duel arena 100% - Little to no lag - Fair exp rates If you are at all interested here is the layout:
In-Game Name/Server Forums Name?: How old are you?: E-mail address/Skype?: What position do you want? (Entertainer, Coder, Suggester, Tester): How long have you coded (ignore if not chosen Coder)?: What time zone are you in?: How long will you be on everyday?: Why do you want to become part of this server?: Any Suggestions?:
Entertainers:
0 (Amount you have)/2 (Amount Wanted) * To host all player events and keep players entertained during these smaller player base days.
Coders:
0/2 *Besides myself
Person 1 Person 2
Suggestors:
0/2
Person 1 Person 2
Testers:
0/2
Person 1 Person 2
All and all its a great place with potential to grow if you are at all interested please contact me via msn :devincjones@msn.com via skype: duopizwavyyyyy or via moparscape forums: just send me a pm.
Applications go!

item.title: Arctic-Pk || Recruiting Developers || 317 || Apply ||
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

No thanks Just giving out phr33 advice to help make your thread be more professional and more of a chance of getting developers.

Read full topic

item.title: Arctic-Pk || Recruiting Developers || 317 || Apply ||
item.dc:creator: @cliche cliche
item.description:
@cliche wrote:

Oh I totally understand, and are you at all interested or just rendering advice?

Read full topic

item.title: Arctic-Pk || Recruiting Developers || 317 || Apply ||
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

You misunderstand what I mean. People on moparscape will not join a “blank development” so to speak. You need to explain what your looking for the team members to perform doing etc.

If you wanted a complete rework of the networking you wouldn’t want an amateur to do it? see what I am getting at?

Read full topic

item.title: Arctic-Pk || Recruiting Developers || 317 || Apply ||
item.dc:creator: @cliche cliche
item.description:
@cliche wrote:

Everyone is a critic today huh? Dude I’m new to this, Im just looking for a developer who can accomplish basic tasks I’m not asking for A custom boss with custom new item rare drops, just who can handle near all of my source sided issues, and development ideas such as? Sorry if thats a dumb sounding question.

Read full topic

item.title: Arctic-Pk || Recruiting Developers || 317 || Apply ||
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Looks decent, but you haven’t really posted any development ideas as to what your objectives are

Read full topic

item.title: Arctic-Pk || Recruiting Developers || 317 || Apply ||
item.dc:creator: @cliche cliche
item.description:
@cliche wrote:

Thanks for the positive feed back. Your comment served no purpose, but to express your uninformed judgement about something you nothing of. Next time play the game then post your views on the server. Thanks a bunch.

Read full topic

item.title: Arctic-Pk || Recruiting Developers || 317 || Apply ||
item.dc:creator: @cliche cliche
item.description:
@cliche wrote:

To be honest its a funny story how this base turned up I was going through old server files and I came upon in my 317 PI folder, this one was unnamed so I honestly don’t even remember where I got it from, I know it uses snippets and help from InsidiaX source and team, Solitude source, and HybridPkz source, credits to those guys.

Read full topic

item.title: Arctic-Pk || Recruiting Developers || 317 || Apply ||
item.dc:creator: @liamp liamp
item.description:
@liamp wrote:

cliche:

Around 10-20 varying on time of day, ect. but we are moving up on the top lists and im slowly putting my name back out there. So i reckon in a weeks time we can grow another 10-15, this is only day 4 back. Are you interested at all?

yeah i would be interested but i need to know what base your using because if its a crap base i wouldn’t join

Read full topic
